articles.title: For Good' trailer shown by Cynthia Erivo, Ariana Grande
articles.description: After a magical year, Oz favorites Cynthia Erivo and Ariana Grande returned to CinemaCon to debut the first trailer for the sequel "Wicked: For Good."
articles.content:
LAS VEGAS – After a bunch of "Wicked" success, the women of Oz returned to CinemaCon for a victory lap – and a glimpse of the future.

articles.title: Tornadoes Reported in South and Midwest as Powerful Storms Strike
articles.description: Millions of people were under severe weather advisories. More than 200,000 customers were without power, and injuries were reported in Kentucky and Arkansas.
articles.content:
Multiple tornadoes were reported to have touched down across parts of the South and the Midwest on Wednesday, as people in several states began to feel the effects of a powerful storm system that was expected to last for several days.

articles.description: Elon Musk looked to downplay Tuesday's major election defeat in Wisconsin -- leaving many to question Musk's influence and whether he could be a political liability.

articles.title: Asian markets slip following Trump's announcements of big tariff hikes
articles.description: Asian markets and U.S. futures tumbled Thursday following U.S. President Donald Trump’s announcement of big increases in tariffs on imports of goods from around the world. Tokyo’s Nikkei 225 index initially dipped more than 4%, but recovered slightly. Trump said he was imposing a 24% “reciprocal tariff” on Japan, one of the United States' closest allies.
articles.content:
BANGKOK (AP) — Asian markets and U.S. futures tumbled Thursday following U.S. President Donald Trump’s announcement of big increases in tariffs on imports of goods from around the world.

articles.title: Republicans join Democrats in Senate vote to rescind Trump Canada tariffs
articles.description: Resolution that would block tariffs passes 51-48 in Senate, in vote that shows Republican unease over president’s plans
articles.content: Several Republican senators joined Democrats to pass a resolution that would block Donald Trump’s tariffs on Canada, a rare rebuke of the president’s trade policy just hours after he announced plans for sweeping import taxes on some of the country’s ... [4226 chars]

articles.title: For Good' First Look Gets Cheers At CinemaCon
articles.description: Universal closed out its CinemaCon with an emotional first look at Jon M. Chu’s Wicked: For Good, with Cynthia Erivo and Ariana Grande onstage.

articles.description: National security adviser and team shared ‘sensitive information’ in group chats on app, sources tell Politico
articles.content:
Donald Trump’s national security adviser, Mike Waltz, and his team have created at least 20 different group chats on the encrypted messaging app Signal to coordinate sensitive national security work, sources tell Politico.

articles.title: Guaranteed possession in 10-minute OT could have unintended consequences
articles.description: Defense could be inclined to let team that receives the kick to score.
articles.content:
